title: How to Make an Origami Paper Basket

steps.title: Start out with a square sheet of paper.
steps.content: Start out with a square sheet of paper . If you can't get square paper use A4 and fold it to get a square then tear off the side.

steps.title: Make a fold from all the corners:
steps.content: Make a fold from all the corners: Diagonal to diagonal and the other 2 corners. Fold the paper in half from the top to the bottom and from the left to the right. You should have 4 folds.

steps.title: Take 2 opposite corners and fold them in so they meet in the middle.
steps.content: Take 2 opposite corners and fold them in so they meet in the middle.

steps.title: Fold the 2 trapeziums in towards the middle and then stand them up.
steps.content: Fold the 2 trapeziums in towards the middle and then stand them up. These are the sides of your origami basket.

steps.title: Take the sides that slope down and push down on them and flick the pointy bit up.
steps.content: Take the sides that slope down and push down on them and flick the pointy bit up.

steps.title: Fold it down to the level of the other sides.
steps.content: Fold it down to the level of the other sides.

steps.title: Do the same to the other side.
steps.content: Do the same to the other side.
